meanings.sent1: I drew different quadrilaterals in my math class.
meanings.sent2: The playground had colorful quadrilaterals painted on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The quadrilaterals on the board looked like a family holding hands.
meanings.sent4: Her notebook was a canvas of quadrilaterals waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The artist's masterpiece featured intricate quadrilaterals in every corner.

meanings.definition: A polygon with four sides and four angles.
meanings.sent1: The garden had a fountain surrounded by small quadrilaterals.
meanings.sent2: The map showed the location of all the quadrilaterals in the city.
meanings.sent3: The quadrilaterals on the flag seemed to be dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a maze of interconnected quadrilaterals, each leading to a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map was filled with mysterious quadrilaterals guiding the way.

meanings.definition: A geometric shape with four straight sides.
meanings.sent1: The building had unique quadrilaterals in its architecture.
meanings.sent2: The kite was designed in the shape of a quadrilateral.
meanings.sent3: The quadrilaterals on the floor formed a path to follow.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like precious gems set in a quadrilateral necklace.
meanings.sent5: The garden maze was a puzzle of interconnected quadrilaterals waiting to be solved.
